name: Geometry Dance Dancing Line
description:
Listening to Music and with practice, you will be able to reach to the destination and with only one finger you can control the game.
Changing environments of ‘Geometry Dance Dancing Line’ will keep you entertained for hours and hours.

Enjoy the Music but be careful alongwith enjoying,Be aware of sharp turns and obstacles.
React quickly to the World changing environments before your eyes before getting hit with the walls.
Stay on the line to survive!!!
